attributes.action: cut aid grants to foreign countries until problems in the UK are sorted out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to ask the UK government to cut all aid to other countries around the world and look after its own citizens first. Why should a community as small as that in the UK be giving aid to other countries when there are things like homelessness and other deserving causes in our own country. Charity begins at home.
